metadata.title: CVE-2023-37476 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: OpenRefine is a free, open source tool for data processing. A carefullycrafted malicious OpenRefine project tar file can be used to triggerarbitrary code execution in the context of the OpenRefine process if a usercan be convinced to import it. The vulnerability exists in all versions ofOpenRefine up to and including 3.7.3. Users should update to OpenRefine3.7.4 as soon as possible. Users unable to upgrade should only importOpenRefine projects from trusted sources.

criterions.comment: openrefine package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
